jigsaw
Class PuzzleCreator

java.lang.Object
  jigsaw.PuzzleCreator

public class PuzzleCreator
extends java.lang.Object

The create method in this class will need to generate unique random numbers, for use as edge "shapes."

Author:
Wei Dai,Song Gao
